title: Tales from the Gas Station (Season 1) by Jack Townsend
description:
All The Stories of your Favorite Gas Station at the Edge of Town.
Support Gas Station JAck and the Upcoming Book with Gas Station merch: https://inktale.com/gasstationjack/
Click to Subscribe to MCP for more Creepy Pasta Storytime! ►http://bit.ly/SubMrCreepyPasta
Horror Isn't "Ad-Friendly" Please support this Channel on Patreon: ►https://www.patreon.com/MrCreepyPasta
Original story:
►

Check out my New BOOK! A Collection of Creepy Pastas compiled by some of my all time favorite authors and friends.
